pages.text: Blank Vault Crystals can roll several objectives of the Vault. Apply a seal to force the objective of a Vault. New objectives may be added on later.

pages.title: Kill The Boss
pages.text: Find the required $(l)Obelisks$() and activate them to spawn the boss. $(br2)This objective can be forced with the use of the $(l)Seal of the Executioner.$() $(br2)A $(l)Boss Crate$() is rewarded when this Vault is succesfully completed.

pages.title: Scavenger Hunt
pages.text: Collect all required items and hand in the items at the $(l)Scavenger Altar$(). $(br2)A $(l)Scavenger Crate$() is rewarded when this Vault is succesfully completed. $(br2)This objective can be forced with the use of the $(l)Seal of the Hunter.$()

pages.title: Cake Hunt
pages.text: Find all the required cakes that are scattered around the Vault Rooms. Pink fog appears around the screen when the player is near the cake. $(br2)A $(l)Crake$() is rewarded when this Vault is succesfully completed. $(br)This objective can be forced with the use of the $(l)Seal of the Confectioner.$()

pages.title: Raffle Vault
pages.text: A Vault to participate in the weekly challenge to get the fastest time in of completing the Vault! $(br2)A $(l)Champion Crate$() is rewarded when you have the fastest time of the week. $(br)This objective will never be rolled randomly and can only be forced with a $(l)Seal of the Challenger.$()

pages.title: The Final Vault
pages.text: $(br)Ready for the final challenge? Stay tuned ...
